product_description.tagline: Be Unforgettable in Navy Blue Sparkle
paragraphs: Ready to own the night? This navy blue rhinestone bodycon mini dress is your secret weapon for standing out in a sea of basic black. Covered in luxe gold crystal rhinestone accents arranged in stunning starburst patterns, you'll catch every light in the room and every eye on the dance floor. The rich navy blue fabric creates the perfect contrast to make those gold rhinestones pop even harder, giving you that high-end sparkle without looking like everyone else.

Designed for your best angles, this bodycon mini hugs your curves with stretchy, comfortable fabric that moves with you all night long. The flirty square neckline and delicate spaghetti straps show just the right amount of skin, while the daring thigh-high slit adds that perfect touch of drama when you walk. Whether you're hitting the club, celebrating NYE, or living your best life at a bachelorette party, this dress works as hard as you do to create those unforgettable moments.

This isn't just another party dress—it's your confidence boost wrapped in navy blue and gold sparkle. Perfect for anyone who refuses to blend in, this dress transforms you from getting-ready excitement to last-call legendary. Pair it with your favorite heels and minimal jewelry (the dress does the talking), and get ready for compliments, photo requests, and that feeling when you know you're the best-dressed person in the room.

faq_section.question: What size should I order?
faq_section.answer: This dress runs true to size and features stretchy fabric for a comfortable, forgiving fit. We recommend ordering your usual size—the bodycon design is meant to hug your curves while the stretch ensures you can move and dance freely. If you're between sizes or prefer a slightly looser fit, size up. Check our size guide tab for detailed measurements to find your perfect fit.

faq_section.question: How long does shipping take?
faq_section.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days within the US. Need it faster? Expedited shipping options are available at checkout for 2-3 day delivery. All orders are processed within 1 business day, and you'll receive tracking information as soon as your dress ships. Planning for a specific event? Order at least 2 weeks in advance to ensure arrival with time to spare.

faq_section.question: What's your return policy?
faq_section.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy from the date of delivery. If the dress doesn't fit or isn't quite what you expected, you can return it for a full refund (minus original shipping costs). Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition with tags attached. See our Returns tab for complete details and instructions on how to start a return.

faq_section.question: How do I care for the rhinestones?
faq_section.answer: Hand wash cold in gentle detergent, inside out, to protect the rhinestones. Never machine wash or put in the dryer—hang or lay flat to air dry. The rhinestones are securely attached, but gentle care will keep them sparkling for years. Avoid harsh chemicals, bleach, or fabric softeners. Store hanging or folded carefully to prevent snagging. A quick steam (not direct iron) can refresh the fabric if needed.

faq_section.question: What material is it made of?
faq_section.answer: This dress features high-quality stretch fabric (polyester blend with spandex) that hugs your curves while staying comfortable all night. The gold crystal rhinestones are individually applied to create the stunning starburst pattern throughout the dress. The fabric has just the right amount of stretch for a flattering bodycon fit that doesn't feel restrictive when you're dancing or sitting.

faq_section.question: What bra should I wear with this?
faq_section.answer: The square neckline and spaghetti straps look best with a strapless bra or adhesive cups/pasties. Many customers go braless since the bodycon fit provides support, but it depends on your comfort level. If you need more support, try a nude or black strapless bra, or use fashion tape to secure adhesive cups. Avoid regular bra straps—they'll show and distract from the clean lines of the neckline.

faq_section.question: Do the rhinestones fall off?
faq_section.answer: Nope! Each rhinestone is securely attached to withstand normal wear and dancing. We quality-check every dress before shipping to ensure all embellishments are firmly in place. With proper care (hand washing inside out, air drying), your rhinestones will stay put through many nights out. If you do notice any loose stones before wearing, a tiny drop of fabric glue will secure them—but this is extremely rare.

faq_section.question: Where can I wear this?
faq_section.answer: Literally anywhere you want to make an entrance! This dress is perfect for nightclubs, bachelorette parties, birthday celebrations, New Year's Eve parties, Vegas trips, girls' nights out, cocktail parties, formal events, or any occasion where you want to sparkle and stand out. The navy blue and gold combo is versatile enough for both winter and summer events. Basically, if there's dancing, drinks, or photos involved, this dress belongs there.

product_tabs.shipping:
**STANDARD SHIPPING (5-7 Business Days):** Free on orders over $75, otherwise $7.95 flat rate within the US. All orders are processed within 1 business day (Monday-Friday). You'll receive tracking information via email as soon as your order ships.

**EXPEDITED SHIPPING (2-3 Business Days):** Available at checkout for $19.95. Perfect if you have an upcoming event and need your dress fast.

**INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:** We ship worldwide! Delivery times vary by location (typically 10-21 business days). International customers are responsible for any customs fees or import duties.

**TRACKING:** All orders include tracking. Check your email for tracking details, or log into your account to view order status.

**ORDER PROCESSING:** Orders placed before 2pm EST ship same day. Weekend orders ship Monday. Allow 1 business day processing before shipping time begins.
product_tabs.returns:
**30-DAY RETURN POLICY**

We want you to love your dress! If it doesn't fit or isn't quite right, return it within 30 days of delivery for a full refund.

**RETURN REQUIREMENTS:**
- Item must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition
- All tags must still be attached
- Returned within 30 days of delivery date
- Original packaging preferred (not required)

**HOW TO RETURN:**
1. Email support@[company].com with your order number and reason for return
2. We'll send you a prepaid return label within 24 hours
3. Pack the dress securely and attach the label
4. Drop off at any USPS location
5. Refund processed within 5-7 business days of receiving your return

**REFUND DETAILS:**
- Full refund to original payment method (minus original shipping costs)
- Return shipping is $7.95 (deducted from refund) unless item is defective
- Exchanges available—just note your size preference in return request

**FINAL SALE ITEMS:** Items marked "Final Sale" or purchased at 50% off or more are not eligible for return.

**QUESTIONS?** Contact us at support@[company].com—we're here to help!
product_tabs.care:
**KEEP YOUR DRESS SPARKLING FOR YEARS**

**WASHING:**
- Hand wash ONLY in cold water with gentle detergent
- Turn dress inside out before washing to protect rhinestones
- Never machine wash or use harsh chemicals
- Avoid bleach and fabric softeners
- Gently swirl in water—don't scrub or wring

**DRYING:**
- Air dry only—never put in dryer
- Hang on padded hanger or lay flat on clean towel
- Keep away from direct sunlight or heat sources
- Allow to dry completely before storing

**IRONING:**
- Do NOT iron directly on rhinestones
- Use steamer on low heat if needed, or iron inside out on lowest setting
- Place pressing cloth between iron and fabric
- Hang in bathroom during hot shower for gentle steam refresh

**STORAGE:**
- Store hanging on padded hanger to maintain shape
- Or fold carefully with tissue paper between folds
- Keep in breathable garment bag to prevent dust
- Avoid storing in plastic bags (traps moisture)
- Store away from direct sunlight to prevent fading

**RHINESTONE CARE:**
- Avoid contact with perfume, lotions, or sprays (apply before putting on dress)
- If a rhinestone loosens, secure with tiny drop of fabric glue
- Check embellishments before each wear
- Handle with care when putting on/taking off

**WEARING TIPS:**
- Remove jewelry before putting on dress to avoid snagging
- Be careful around rough surfaces (brick walls, textured furniture)
- Avoid sitting on rough surfaces when possible

With proper care, your rhinestone dress will sparkle through countless nights out!
product_tabs.size_guide:
**BODYCON DRESS SIZE GUIDE**

This dress runs true to size with stretchy fabric for a comfortable, curve-hugging fit.

| SIZE | US SIZE | BUST | WAIST | HIPS | LENGTH |
|------|---------|------|-------|------|--------|
| XS   | 0-2     | 32-33" | 24-25" | 34-35" | 32" |
| S    | 4-6     | 34-35" | 26-27" | 36-37" | 33" |
| M    | 8-10    | 36-37" | 28-29" | 38-39" | 34" |
| L    | 12-14   | 38-40" | 30-32" | 40-42" | 35" |
| XL   | 16-18   | 41-43" | 33-35" | 43-45" | 36" |

**HOW TO MEASURE:**
- **BUST:** Measure around the fullest part of your bust with arms relaxed at sides
- **WAIST:** Measure around the narrowest part of your natural waistline
- **HIPS:** Measure around the fullest part of your hips and backside
- **LENGTH:** Measured from top of shoulder strap to hem

**FIT NOTES:**
- Bodycon fit designed to hug curves
- Stretch fabric provides flexibility and comfort
- If between sizes, size up for looser fit or size down for ultra-fitted look
- Dress length is mini (typically hits mid-thigh)
- Square neckline and spaghetti straps are adjustable

**STILL UNSURE?**
Email us at support@[company].com with your measurements and we'll help you find your perfect size. Include your height for length reference.

**MODEL INFO:** Model is 5'7", wearing size Small. Bust 34", Waist 26", Hips 36".
